name: Gitter Don't
description: This hides virtually everything from the gitter.im user interface except the channel list and the chat.  No channel descriptions, no user lists, no profile links, just distraction-free chatting.  Gives the chat area a warmer color, can be customized.
additional_info: Written for the FreeCodeCamp mansion of gitter rooms, this goes well with the Gitter Done for FreeCodeCamp userscript for GreaseMonkey/TamperMonkey.
